coreAtributes.authorTag: A small tag sewn into the side seam reads "Official Enforcer Issue, MFD by DSG Threadworks."
coreAtributes.name: Enforcer's greatcoat
coreAtributes.description: A large overcoat commonly issued to Enforcers as a uniform item for inclement weather. Made from heavy wool, it protects the wearer from rain and cold.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(put)] [npc.her] arms through the greatcoat's sleeves and [npc.verb(button)] up the front.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(help)] [npc2.name] [npc2.verb(put)] [npc2.her] arms through the greatcoat's sleeves and [npc.verb(button)] up the front.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(force)] [npc2.namePos] arms through the greatcoat's sleeves and hastily [npc.verb(button)] up the front.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unbutton)] the front of [npc.her] greatcoat and [npc.verb(pull)] [npc.her] arms out of the sleeves.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unbutton)] the front of [npc2.namePos] greatcoat and [npc.verb(help)] [npc2.her] [npc2.verb(pull)] [npc2.her] arms out of the sleeves.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pop)] open the buttons on the front of [npc2.namePos] greatcoat and roughly [npc.verb(pull)] [npc2.her] arms out of the sleeves.

replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] hastily [npc.verb(button)] up the front of [npc2.namePos] greatcoat.
